body:
Part of https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/29329

http://doc.rust-lang.org/std/ffi/


Here's what needs to be done to close out this issue: 

- [ ] [the module docs](https://doc.rust-lang.org/std/ffi/) are almost non-existent, and should talk about how this isn't so much FFI bindings as it is stuff useful for interop with C, which is FFI of course, but that's it. It's not a comprehensive FFI solution.
- [ ] [`CStr`](https://doc.rust-lang.org/std/ffi/struct.CStr.html) should make the comparison with `str`. it needs a lot of links.
- [ ] [`CString`](https://doc.rust-lang.org/std/ffi/struct.CString.html) should make the comparison with `String.` It also needs a lot of links.
- [ ] [`FromBytesWithNulError`](https://doc.rust-lang.org/std/ffi/struct.FromBytesWithNulError.html) should use the iterator style boilerplate for linking to where it came from.
- [ ] [`IntoStringError`](https://doc.rust-lang.org/std/ffi/struct.IntoStringError.html) same
- [ ] [`NulError`](https://doc.rust-lang.org/std/ffi/struct.NulError.html) same. 
- [ ] [`OsStr`](https://doc.rust-lang.org/std/ffi/struct.OsStr.html) should make the `str` comparison, and needs a lot more elaboartion. It should look like `CStr`.
- [ ] [`OsString`](https://doc.rust-lang.org/std/ffi/struct.OsString.html) should make the comparison with `String`, and should look a lot like `CString`.
